Monthly Cost</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_monthly_cost</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><formula/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="Currency">currency</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>20</max_length><name>cmdb_ci_win_server</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-07 23:59:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>2dfaebaf883232107f443c664d990019</sys_id><sys_name>Est. sys_update_xml.name: Zombie
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sa_pattern"><sa_pattern action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><ci_type>cmdb_ci_appl_generic</ci_type><cpattern_type>2</cpattern_type><description/><directory>false</directory><enforce_proc_classy>false</enforce_proc_classy><invoke_per_account>false</invoke_per_account><metadata_id>e61da7a3887232107f443c664d990050</metadata_id><name>Zombie Metrics Collection</name><ndl>library {
	name = "Zombie Metrics Collection"
	id = "e61da7a3887232107f443c664d990050"
	description = "Zombie Metrics Collection"
	step {
		name = "Get Zombie Metrics"
		runcmd_to_var {
			cmd = "powershell (Get-NetTCPConnection -State Established).Count"
			execution_mode = "DEFAULT"
			var_names = "active_conn_output"
			parsing_strategy = regex_parsing {regex = "(\\d+)"}
			if_not_found_do = nop {}
			cache_flag = 0
		}
	}
	step {
		name = "Save to CMDB"
		set_attr {
			"cmdb_ci_win_server[*].u_active_connections"
			get_attr {"active_conn_output"}
		}
	}
}
</ndl><parent/><serverless>false</serverless><source/><sys_class_name>sa_pattern</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-02-08 00:08:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e61da7a3887232107f443c664d990050</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Zombie Metrics Collection</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sa_pattern_e61da7a3887232107f443c664d990050</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-08 01:14:25</sys_updated_on><version/></sa_pattern></record_update>
